title: The Weird and The Wonderful
description:
Nikki explores the wacky and wonderful side of life with James Parker, a fan of everything quirky. From a group of humans who come together online and pretend they are insects, to a woman who makes a boat out of a common fungus — let your freak flag fly!

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--
